JobFullDesc: As one of the world’s leading asset managers, we are solely dedicated to delivering an investment experience that helps people get more out of life. If you're looking for challenging work, smart colleagues, and a global employer with a social conscience, explore your potential at InvescoJob Purpose (Job Summary):  Develop the next generation technologies that change how users interact with the Invesco Vision platform. The role will also allow for significant opportunities for creativity and innovation.Key Responsibilities / Duties:  Work on cutting-edge project to develop the next generation of portfolio analytics web application Work with technologists, UI/UX engineers, researchers to architect and build mobile-responsive web applications that are highly scalable, secure and compatible with modern browsers (IE/Edge/Chrome/Firefox/Safari) Participate in the full software development life-cycle Communicate technical issues to both technical and non-technical audience Utilize proactive problem-solving to address challenges and functional concerns Work with the Senior Engineers to help establish back-end best practices and guidelinesWork Experience / Knowledge:  2+ years of professional front-end development experience with JavaScript, HTML, CSS and/or other front-end technologies 1-2 years of Working experience of web frameworks (React, Angular or Backbone). Preferably with the ReactJS/Redux/Flux technology stack Knowledge of design and creating an attractive and seamless user experience Good communication skills, ability to mentor and work collaboratively Highly organized and with great time management skills Strong attention to details Familiarity with TensorFlow.js or similar frameworks and ability to implement/deploy ML models on the browser Experience with deploying apps in docker containers Prior experience working in financial service/fintechSkills / Other Personal Attributes Required:  Very strong attention to detail with internal drive to sanity check and triangulate results Strong interpersonal and partnership skills Ability to prioritize work and allocate time efficiently to maximize impact to investment process Passion to deliver excellent workFormal Education:  BA/BS in Computer Science or related technical field, or equivalent experienceWhat’s in it for you?Our people are at the very core of our success.
